rationale: The segment reports export projections but does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: For 2024, Brazilian chicken exports will reach up to 5.3 million tons, as the world continues to demand Brazilian products.

rationale: The segment uses a future tense verb ('will reach') which does not denote realised impact, although it includes a scale ('up to 5.3 million tons'). Also relates to financial/trade metrics.
